events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but it doesn't fit me and I would like to request a refund. The product is still unused and in perfect condition.
The issue has been categorised as a refund request based on the customer's mention of returning the item for money back.
The case has been assigned to our refund specialist team for further handling.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm here to assist you with your refund request for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the item has been opened or used in any way?
Sure, my order number is 12345678, and I confirm that the jacket is still in its original packaging and has not been used.
Thank you for the information. We can initiate the refund process immediately. Please ship the jacket back to our returns address and we will process the refund once received.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the clear instructions and will send the package back by tomorrow.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund to your original payment method. You should see the amount reflected in your account within 5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund without any issues. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
As we have not heard back, we assume your refund process is complete. Closing this case now but feel free to contact us anytime.
